Articles.Content:
Are there any Orion style 3.75 m capsules? I already tried the Taurus HVC and didn't like it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T00:01:45Z" title="05/06/2015 12:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by Laythe Dweller**

They the one from Chaka Monkey Exploration. That's a beautiful Orion replica, and it's 3.75m.

SmallFatFetus
That pack has way too many parts, and when I try to prune it down the pod doesn't show up either. Is there any other pack with a 3.75m command pod?

The American Pack [http://www./download/dptj659hz8r8gn2/AmericanPack.zip](http://www./download/dptj659hz8r8gn2/AmericanPack.zip) and there is a Chaka Monkey Exploration lite [https://www.dropbox.com/s/gbd5wyw7l71mrhg/COL-271.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/gbd5wyw7l71mrhg/COL-271.zip?dl=0) which is just SLS.

EDIT- And there is this WIP it does need some more parts [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85275-WIP-NASA-SLS-Released-Orion-MPCV-Core-Module-1-0-4-18-2015](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85275-WIP-NASA-SLS-Released-Orion-MPCV-Core-Module-1-0-4-18-2015)

Edit- Now, I think about it there just alittle bigger then 3.75, I think one time, I wrote a rescale for the The American Pack to be 3.75

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T01:25:55Z" title="05/05/2015 01:25  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**
Wow, you're probably the most helpful person on the forums!

> 
> Are there any Orion style 3.75 m capsules? I already tried the Taurus HVC and didn't like it.

Nertea has one 3.75m command pod each in his Stockalike Station Expansion and his Near Future Spacecraft
[Taurus HCV](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75074) - the best 3.75m utility pack for now. Looks pretty Orion-ish.

> 
> [Taurus HCV](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75074) - the best 3.75m utility pack for now. Looks pretty Orion-ish.

But OP stated he didn't like the Taurus HCV

> 
> But OP stated he didn't like the Taurus HCV

An opinion that has to be ignored on principle!

/kidding ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Nice collection in here!

Theres NovaPunch (a large parts pack) which has the Freya (or Freyja) command module, I think that's supposed to be Orion-like, it's 3.75m too.

The Taurus HCV is based more on the Dragon I believe.

Nertea has one in his near future spacecraft parts

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-1-02-Near-Future-Technologies-%28NFSolar-NFSpacecraft-NFConstruction-hotfixed%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-1-02-Near-Future-Technologies-%28NFSolar-NFSpacecraft-NFConstruction-hotfixed%29)

The SDHI pack looks good, can someone scale up the parts to 3.75m so I can use it with a capsule?

- - - Updated - - -

Alright, I am going to start a new thread requesting an Orion replica as there's not really any good ones out there. Requesting that this thread be locked.
